ShortSummary: Utility that builds a HikariConfig from Hibernate properties by mapping common settings and translating any hibernate.hikari.* entries.
Summary: HikariConfigurationUtil.loadConfiguration(Map) creates a Properties set for HikariConfig by mapping Hibernate AvailableSettings (isolation, autocommit, driver, url, user, pass) to HikariCP keys, then copies all properties starting with "hibernate.hikari." (including dataSource.*) after stripping the prefix. It returns a new HikariConfig. Assumes String keys/values; minimal validation.
MostImportantThings: Maps Hibernate -> HikariCP: ISOLATION->transactionIsolation, AUTOCOMMIT->autoCommit, DRIVER->driverClassName, URL->jdbcUrl, USER->username, PASS->password
Copies any "hibernate.hikari.*" properties to HikariConfig by removing the prefix (thus supporting dataSource.* passthrough)
Assumes Map keys/values are Strings; uses raw Map and casts (risk of ClassCastException if not Strings)
No validation or type conversion beyond direct string copy
CONFIG_PREFIX_DATASOURCE constant exists but behavior is covered by the generic prefix handling
RelatedFunctionality: Hibernate integration via a Hikari-based ConnectionProvider (e.g., HikariConnectionProvider, if present)
